sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: SKIMMIA, in botany: A genus of the monogynia order, belonging to the tetrandria claſs of plants ; and in the natural method ranking under the 40th order, Perſonatae. The calyx is quadripartite ; the corolla conſiſts of four concave petals ; and the berry contains four ſeeds. There is only one ſpecies, viz. the Japonica.
